subject: Received Wrong Pedals
description_text:
Hello
I ordered the PRO X ULTRA from Amazon.com order number 112-4451499-4382643 and have received the wrong set.
I got the PRO X set, notably different than the pro x ultra 


Should I just return or is it possible to receive a replacement directly

Thanks in advanced,
Archit 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text:
Never mind it looks like the printing on the box is incorrect. Sorry for the confusion 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Archit Kalla,  Sorry for the confusion — the packaging hasn’t been updated yet, but the product you received is actually the Ultra version. The older ProX model has been discontinued.
